# Social (Third party / OAuth 2.0 / SAML) login with SuperTokens

## Features

- Sign-up / Sign-in with OAuth 2.0 (Like google, facebook etc..) and SAML providers <br/>
- Secure session management <br/>
- Secure session management <br/>
- Email verification <br/>

## Demo application

- See our [live demo app](https://emailpassword.demo.supertokens.com/).
- Clone the [React + NodeJS source code on Github](https://github.com/supertokens/supertokens-auth-react/tree/master/examples/with-emailpassword).
```bash
git clone https://github.com/supertokens/supertokens-auth-react.git

cd supertokens-auth-react/examples/with-emailpassword/

# Follow the instructions in the README.md file...
```

:::note
This demo app is for reference only, and is not meant as boilerplate code for new apps.
:::

<!-- ./emailpassword/appInfo.mdx -->
<!-- 1 -->

The `appInfo` object is to be specified on the frontend as well as on the backend.
```ts
let appInfo: {
    appName: string,
    websiteDomain: string,
    apiDomain: string,
    websiteBasePath?: string,  // optional
    apiBasePath?: string,  // optional
    apiGatewayPath?: string // optional
}
```
